content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Vocational training as a certified freight forwarding agent

There is always a lot to do in our head office in Bremen: whether sea freight, project transports, air freight or customized logistic solutions – we make everything possible for our customers. And if you are an apprentice or a trainee you are in the middle of everything: when does the next container ship from Xingang arrive? What’s the fastest way to deliver those hazardous goods to Johannesburg? And how do you transport a 50 ton package to the Rocky Mountains? At Monnard you work with partners from all over the world and develop innovative solutions for our customers.

Do you also want to offer the best from door-to-door to your customers and are you looking for a reliable partner with solid know-how in the logistics world for this task? Put us to a test and you will find that your search in Germany has come to an end! Every new challenge is a possibility – let’s tackle them jointly…

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
